name: The Oberoi Cecil, Shimla
hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

mobile.headline: Enjoy 10% savings
mobile.valid_days: Offer valid on the following days: .

description: The hotel is located in Shimla, the gateway to the majestic Himalayas. Downtown Hotel with Colonial styling, 1 km from Shimla Station & 22 km from Jubalhatti-Shimla Airport. The Hotel is situated at the quite end of the famous Mall and is an ideal base from which to discover the unique beauty of the spectacular Himalayan ranges, Cedar forests and ancient monasteries.

Drivers have no place to place to sleep ....so watch out on that

name: The Orchid Shimla
description: Perched in the hills, yet in the heart of the beautiful city of Shimla, The Orchid Hotel Shimla offers a perfect blend of modern living and nature experiences. We are a 5-star Boutique hotel in Shimla, offering guests with amenities that define luxury and indulging them in the finest 5-star experience. The imposing structure of the hotel speaks of elegance, with rooms that are the perfect nest.

amenities.key: Free Wifi in the Business Center
amenities.name: Free Wifi in the Business Center

room_tips.text: Plan in advance and book directly through them to get the best prices
The hotel is around 20 min away from Mall road.
Try to avoid summer vacation to visit Shimla
As it was season.  The price was very high ,
take valley-view rooms as the view is good in both morning and night !
Don't go as per the floors, all the rooms mostly have great views!
No public transport available, bring your own car
We got room 306, which was quite spacious and had a panoramic view
Any help required on hotel consult Mr anshul and Mr Neeraj.. they r genuine person
Please choose rooms on 3rd floor as it has 360 degree view of Shimla City.

name: Chapslee

photo.caption: Chapslee - a Trip down India's Princely Era !!

description: If youтАЩre looking for a boutique hotel in Shimla, look no further than Chapslee. Close to some of Shimla's most popular landmarks, such as Shimla Heritage Walk (1.7 mi) and Viceregal Lodge (2.2 mi), Chapslee Hotel is a great destination for tourists. Chapslee Hotel features room service and a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts breakfast and dinner. If you are driving to Chapslee, free parking is available. While visiting Shimla, you may want to try some schnitzel at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Wake & Bake Cafe. Shimla is also home to Chadwick Falls, a popular waterfall that is not too far from Chapslee. The staff at Chapslee looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

room_tips.text: its paradise !!!! just go !!!! needs 3 days at least.
All rooms are wonderful
All rooms are great.  We stayed in the Royal Suite, which was remarkable.
A few rooms on the first floor have really nice views. Every room is unique and has its own selling point.
When we went, we were the only guests at the hotel so they offered to upgraded room at no cost.

name: Welcomhotel By ITC Hotels Shimla
description: WelcomHotel Shima is located amidst lush oak, cedar and pine trees and at an altitude of 2100 m above sea level with sweeping views of the majestic Himalayan range. The hotel offers a range of accommodation options with 47 operational rooms and 01 family suite in a crescendo of views, panoramas, balconies and terraces. The rooms, filled with natural light, are spacious with large bay windows and private balconies so that guests wake up to the enchanting sounds of the free flowing winds and breathe in pure air. WelcomCafe Cedar, the all-day dining restaurant with a large private terrace overlooking the majestic Himalayas, offers the best of Indian, oriental and Continental cuisines. Swizzle, the bar and lounge serves a fine range of liquor, cocktails and mocktails along with a delectable choice of snacks. Spanning two floors, the hotelтАЩs meeting and event space can house up to 300 guests and are ideal for corporate events, social gatherings and spectacular destination weddings.
address: Village Patengali, Near Tarapur Mashobra, Shimla 171007 India

room_tips.text: Parking available, beautiful place for kids to play with in the hotel. ItтАЩs a best place to visit when in shimla.
The slope to the property needs a good car and a skilled driver preferably.
best room is one with the view where you can experience Sunrise & Sunset both
The route for entry is really steep so drive with caution.
Nothing everything good

name: Larisa Shimla
hotel_class_attribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
description: Posing with a blue sky as its umbrella, Larisa Shimla stands tall as a resort which has a fusion of modern amenities with a relaxed atmosphere. A touch of luxury is reflected in every room and the delectable menu is a treat for the food lovers. The bar itself has an extensive list of spirits which make evenings even more sought after. The open-air barbeque is as inviting as it sounds, and if the chill interferes with your gaiety, the bonfire can warm you up instantly. Spend a quite time at the Library or test your talent with the pool table. Larisa Shimla is replete with all that which makes a great vacation even greater. The resort is at a calm distance of 4 km from the Mall Road and at a convenient 17 km from Shimla Airport. For those driving up to the summer capital of the Britishers, they just have to look left to be at the premises.
address: Kachi Ghatti Nh - 5 Kacchi Ghati, Tara Devi Road, Shimla 171010 India
local_address: Kachi Ghatti Nh - 5, Kacchi Ghati, Tara Devi Road, 171010
